sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import style from './Users.module.css' const Users = (props) => { if(props.state.length === 0){ props.setUsers([ {"id": 1, followed: true, "fullName": "Dmitry", "status": 'I am a boss', photoUrl: "https://whatsism.com/uploads/posts/2018-07/1530546770_rmk_vdjbx10.jpg", location: {city: "Minsk", country: "Belarus"}}, {"id": 2, followed: false, "fullName": "Masha ", "status": 'ha ah ha', photoUrl: "https://whatsism.com/uploads/posts/2018-07/1530546770_rmk_vdjbx10.jpg", location: {city: "Kokshetau", country: "Kazakhstan"}}, {"id": 3, followed: false, "fullName": "Masat", "status": 'Hello. how you doing', photoUrl: "https://whatsism.com/uploads/posts/2018-07/1530546770_rmk_vdjbx10.jpg", location: {city: "Astana", country: "Kazakhstan"}}, {"id": 4, followed: true, "fullName": "Gulmira", "status": 'Hello world!', photoUrl: "https://whatsism.com/uploads/posts/2018-07/1530546770_rmk_vdjbx10.jpg", location: {city: "Astana", country: "Kazakhstan"}} ]) } return
{props.state.map(user =>
{user.fullName}
{user.status}
{user.location.city}
{user.location.country}
) }
} export default Users
